University Hospital of Heraklion (PAGNI) Mobile App

Mobile App · Hospital ·

Design and development of a React Native mobile app for PAGNI hospital.

The Client

University Hospital of Heraklion (PAGNI)

Voutes

71110 Heraklion

Greece

The Project

Pagni mobile app includes all the information from the hospital's official website in the form of a simple step-by-step guide.

I developed the Pagni mobile app for IOs and Android using React Native, MUI, Android Studio and Xcode, and i18n for multi language support (English & Greek). I designed and followed a simple, clean-cut UI with a high contrast color scheme, offering an easy-to-navigate menu.

View Website

What I Delivered

  • Simple, easy-to-navigate UI
  • Minimal Design
  • MUI Components

My Services

  • UX and UI Design
